title: 怎么样可以吧20G内存的服务器资源耗光
author: 网邻
txt_content:
怎么样可以吧20G内存的服务器资源耗光

不要TNT

服务器就我一个人  

我在虐服

求告知如何耗光资源

replies.author: 网邻
replies.txt_content:
木槿子 发表于 2015-8-13 21:35

怕玩TNT 炸死他们 所以自己玩

replies.txt_content:
15253540 发表于 2015-8-13 21:31
我10G都没耗完过
无聊没事干  糟了一个20G内存的服务器 想看看服务器是否可以虐待死

replies.txt_content: 高频/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager,Riding:{id:Villager}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码即可

replies.author: MC........
replies.txt_content: 用WorldEdit把一大块区域设置成岩浆或者掉落沙

replies.author: 鳥妖
replies.txt_content:
几个大箱子，里面装满了半砖
然后再一下子砍爆那些大箱子（身上用单个方块，比如单个泥土填满背包空位，不让半砖进来）
你想想满地掉落物多壮观。。。

如果不行，，，，，，
叫一群人来跑图

replies.author: qrbqrb4728116
replies.txt_content: 你什么配置，你处理器要是不好的话，配置不好的话，，，，，，
我家里服务器16GBX2....结果客户端加了100多个mod，高清材质，高配光影和一个大型服务端都只占了15G...第二根内存条一直在吃灰...

replies.author: 魔末
replies.txt_content:
开群组服，一个电脑弄10个，然后每个服务器都疯狂的卡区块，就可以了
话说，楼主你是要熊吗

replies.author: Lucky_fish0w0
replies.txt_content: 用指令：/summon PrimedTnt ~ ~1 ~ {Fuse:127,Motion:[2.0,2.0,0.0]}复制代码然后指令方块超频激活

replies.author: 芬海fen_hai
replies.txt_content: 最简单，开加速器+跑图(开了这个一般都会ban，反正我没开过233)

同时开了两个MC都开着最高配光影也没卡住....
